title: Got my first Camera
description: I just bought a Nikon F2 without any prior knowledge. I'm diving headfirst into the world of analog photography. Exciting times ahead!

title: My First Roll
description: This isn't officially my first roll (I opened the camera back and exposed the first one to light). But this roll marks the beginning of my journey into this new hobby. Took my camera to central Switzerland while visiting my parents.

title: Brutus Concert
description: My friend invited me to a concert and I got to borrow a point-and-shoot camera. Excited to test out some shots in a dark venue!

title: Techno Event
description: Loving the style of the point-and-shoot, I bought a Yashica T4. Took it to a techno event and captured some nightlife scenes.

title: Paris Street Photography
description: What's better than testing new film and techniques on the streets of Paris? Took a different approach to sightseeing and it was fantastic.

title: Paris CS:GO Major
description: While in Paris, I managed to sneak my film camera into the arena and captured some moments at the Major.

title: Simon Nora Wedding
description: At the coast in northern Croatia, I was able to capture my cousin's wedding. It was such a beautiful experience.

title: Photo Dump
description: After returning from Croatia, I still had some rolls to fill. We made a few stops and I captured more spontaneous moments.

title: Madagascar
description: Captured people and life during my trip to Madagascar. Getting film rolls through TSA was nerve-wracking. I had so much film with me!

title: Bearpit Concert
description: My first assignment for friends, capturing the raw energy of the Bearpit concert. A night to remember!

title: High&Heads Techno Event
description: Second assignment and it was a blast. Loved enjoying the music while capturing the ambiance at the High&Heads techno event.

title: Leica Street Photography
description: First time shooting with a Leica rangefinder. Explored Swiss cities on a weekend trip and captured some stunning street scenes.

title: Street Photography Dump
description: With my camera as a constant companion, capturing everyday and nightlife moments. This collection is growing nicely.

title: High&Heads Techno Event 2
description: Another paid assignment! Captured the underground vibes of the High&Heads techno event in a garage setting.

title: Copenhagen CS2 Major
description: Documented the excitement and intensity of the Copenhagen CS2 Major. Captured some really memorable moments.

title: Film Fotowalk
description: Joined the SwissFilmClub for a photowalk in Zurich. Loved capturing the vibrant scenes and interactions on film.

title: Thanks for Reading My Diary
description: I hope you enjoyed following my journey through the lens of my camera. Each roll has been a stepping stone, capturing memories and experiences. Thank you for being a part of this adventure!
